about_the_game:
Dive into a pixel-packed, mind-bending journey with Blu-Dude in the Quest of Reality in Time, where the boundaries of reality dissolve into lines of code, and nothing is quite as it seems. Meet Blu-Dude—a cheerful and energetic sprite on a straightforward mission, or so he thought. As he ventures forward, Blu-Dude realizes there’s an unsettling force beneath the surface. Is he just a character in a game, or does his world hold a complexity far beyond what he understands?

You the gamer must embark on a journey with Blu-Dude, navigate through a vibrant, retro-styled world. Filled with secrets and NPC's who might not be what they seem. Blu-Dudes mission? To understand his purpose and maybe even meet his creators.  Along the way, you'll help him uncover the truth to his 8-bit world. 

Blu-Dude In The Quest of Reality In Time features many vibrant areas for you to explore with Blu-Dude. Enjoy a semi-open world adventure where you decide the pace! 

As Blu-Dude progresses, players will uncover in the following gameplay below.  

Gameplay:

  • Unique art styles: Each artist on our team meshed styles to help create Blu-Dude In The Quest of Reality In Time. Many fun filled hours have been spent creating this world. 

  • Fourth-Wall Breaks: Experience moments where Blu-Dude and Developers directly talk to each other adding to the reality of the situation. 

  • Exploration: We want this to be enjoyable for you play at your own pace! Take your time or speed run to see what Reality really is Blu-Dude. 

  • Music: Featuring music from both Oregon local artists and custom made tracks for your listening enjoyment. 

  • 2-D Side Scroller with a linear open world mechanic.

In Blu-Dude in the Quest of Reality in Time, you’re not merely playing a game—you’re part of Blu-Dude’s search for truth, a quest that spirals into questions of existence and purpose that may even have you questioning your own. Are you guiding Blu-Dude, or is he reaching out to understand you?

name: Blu-Dude In The Quest of Reality In Time

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 6100
  • Graphics: GTX730
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i52400
  • Memory: 25 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX1060

short_description: In Blu-Dude in the Quest of Reality in Time, you're not just playing—you’re joining Blu-Dude on a profound search for truth. What starts as a lighthearted adventure transforms into an exploration into his reality. What is your purpose?
